title: SolidWorks 3D CAD Career Path
description:
Has successfully completed the online, non-credit Specialization SOLIDWORKS 3D CAD for Education.

Courses: SOLIDWORKS Foundations: Sketching and Extrusion; SOLIDWORKS Advanced Sketching and Reference Geometry; SOLIDWORKS Revolution and Cut Features; SOLIDWORKS Feature Patterns and Sweeps; SOLIDWORKS Assemblies and Exam Level Part Modeling.

In this Specialization, learners developed and honed essential skills for today's dynamic workforce, including 3D modeling, sketching, feature application, pattern creation, and assembly design using SOLIDWORKS. Through hands-on projects, they gained practical experience in solving real-world CAD challenges, preparing them for industry applications.
subject: Engineering

title: xDesign 3D CAD Career Path
description:
Has successfully completed the online, non-credit Specialization SOLIDWORKS xDesign for Education.

Courses: xDesign Foundations: Sketching and Extrusion; xDesign Advanced Sketching and Reference Geometry; xDesign Revolution and Cut Features; xDesign Feature Patterns and Sweeps; xDesign Assemblies and Exam Level Part Modeling.

In this Specialization, learners developed and honed essential skills for today's dynamic workforce, including 3D modeling, sketching, feature application, pattern creation, and assembly design using SOLIDWORKS xDesign. Through hands-on projects, they gained practical experience in solving real-world CAD challenges, preparing them for industry applications.
subject: Engineering
